member.summary: This class implements a window in which one of the recommended patterns can be chosen.

member.summary: Erforderliche Designervariable.

members.member:
Constructor.
A hashmap with mismatches as keys and lists of patterns that are able to solve the corresponding mismatches as values.+

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.InitializeChoice
member.summary: This method creates a choice view for different design patterns. It also creates buttons which lead to a detailed view of the corresponding PatternDescriptions.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.AddMismatch(Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Interfaces.IMismatch)
member.summary: Adds the mismatch text and the belonging patterns to the GUI.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.AddGeneratorButtons
member.summary: Adds the "Generate Adaptor" and "Generate Prediction Model" buttons to the GUI.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.AddSpecificationButtons
member.summary: Adds the "Provided Specification" and "Required Specification" buttons to the GUI.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.ListPatterns(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Lists the given patterns and creates a choice and a details button for each pattern.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector
member.summary:
Main class of the PatterSelection component. Controls the the GUI for user choice.
TODO: Return selected patterns so that configuration and generation can started by the Control component.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.mismatchSolvingPatterns
member.summary: Hashmap that contains all mismatches and a list of patterns for each mismatch that is able to correct the mismatch.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.selectionDialog
member.summary: Instance of the selection GUI

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.requiredSpecification
member.summary: Interface model specification of the required interface.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.providedSpecification
member.summary: Interface model specification of the provided interface.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.patternDirectory
member.summary: Path to the directory of the selected pattern.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.templates
member.summary: A list of templates for the selected pattern.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.selectedPattern
member.summary: The selected pattern.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.compileAdaptor
member.summary: If true an adaptor is compiled at the end of the selection process.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.compilePredictionModel
member.summary: If true a prediction model is compiled at the end of the selection process.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.#ctor
member.summary: Standard constructor.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.Button_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This method is called, when one of the buttons for the detailed view is clicked. The method opens a new window which lists the details of the chosen pattern.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.Generator_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This method is called, when a generator button has been clicked. The method opens a new instance of CodeSmith for every template that is listed in the PatternDescription of the chosen pattern. If no pattern is chosen a MessageBox is opened.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.Specification_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This method is called, when a specification button has been clicked. The method opens a new TextBox is open showing the chosen QML specification.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.ChoosePattern(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: This is a helper method for generator_Click which chooses the selected pattern and calls another functions to open the corresponding templates.
member.param: The name of the selected radio button.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.OpenTemplates
member.summary: This is a helper method for generator_Click which opens the given templates in CodeSmith.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.Proc_Exited(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Is called when CodeSmith is exited. Calls OpenTemplates to restart CodeSmith with the next template or compile the generated sources and return to the selection.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.Compile
member.summary: Compiles the assembly for the current adaptor or prediction model.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.Selector.StartCodeSmith(System.String)
member.summary: Starts the CodeSmith configuration and generation GUI with the given template.
member.param: The name of a CodeSmith template file. As path the templates directory of the pattern is taken.

member.summary: Creates a new window including a text box.
